VNC VIEWERS INFORMATION
========================

VNC Manager v5.0 supports both TightVNC and RealVNC viewers.

TIGHTVNC (Recommended - Included)
----------------------------------
- Version: 2.8.85 (latest as of 2026-01)
- License: GPL (free and open source)
- Official Website: https://www.tightvnc.com
- Download Page: https://www.tightvnc.com/download.php

To use TightVNC, download and install the 64-bit Windows installer from:
https://www.tightvnc.com/download.php

File: tightvnc-2.8.85-gpl-setup-64bit.msi (approximately 2.5 MB)

After installation, TightVNC Viewer will be automatically detected by VNC Manager.

REALVNC
-------
- License: Free for personal use
- Official Website: https://www.realvnc.com
- Download Page: https://www.realvnc.com/en/connect/download/viewer/

To use RealVNC, download and install VNC Viewer from:
https://www.realvnc.com/en/connect/download/viewer/

After installation, RealVNC Viewer will be automatically detected by VNC Manager.

SWITCHING BETWEEN VIEWERS
--------------------------
From the VNC Manager main menu, press 'V' to switch between TightVNC and RealVNC.

NOTES
-----
- Both viewers must be installed separately - they are not included in this distribution
- VNC Manager will automatically detect which viewer is installed
- If both are installed, you can switch between them at runtime
- TightVNC is recommended for its open-source license and better performance
